title: Bridesmaids Revisited
description: "Rosemary, Thora, and Jane lived at the end of the lane, one was thin, one was fat, and one was very plain." The three "bridesmaids" were best friends to Ellie Haskell's late grandmother Sophia, and hold a seance for Ellie to make contact. The life-changing journey includes a seance, a hidden diary, and a murder that took place more than fifty years ago.
author: Dorothy Cannell
